overview: • Graduate of the Dental Faculty, Hebrew University, Hadassah Jerusalem, where he also specialized and earned his Master’s Degree in Dentistry. • Specialist in orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics. • Maintains a private practice in Tel Aviv, Israel, limited to orthodontics, with an emphasis on adult and esthetic orthodontics. • Clinical instructor in the Department of Orthodontics, Tel-Hashomer Hospital, IDF, Israel. • Past president of the Israeli Orthodontic Society (IOS) and past secretary-treasurer of the International Federation of Esthetic Dentistry (IFED). • Former editor of the Journal of the Israeli Orthodontic Society, and editor of three books:  Lingual Orthodontics, (Decker, 1998), The Art of the Smile (Quintessence, 2005) and The Art of Treatment Planning(Quintessence 2009). • Active member of the European Academy of Aesthetic Dentistry- EAED, the American Association of Orthodontists- AAO and the World Federation of Orthodontists - WFO • Lectures all over the world on esthetic orthodontics and adult multidisciplinary orthodontic treatment and conducts courses in lingual orthodontics around the globe.
